summary: Two teen witches who were separated at birth and were adopted by two different families meet on their 21st birthday and must use their powers to save the world in which they were born, where their birth mother still lives.
cast: Tia Mowry-Hardrict|Tamera Mowry-Housley|Kristen Wilson|Patrick Fabian|Jennifer Robertson|Pat Kelly|Jessica Greco|Jackie Rosenbaum|Arnold Pinnock|Karen Holness|Jessica Feliz|David Ingram|Kathryn Haggis|Albert Howell|Natalie Krill|Geri Hall|Lisa Ng|Gabriel Plener|Sharon McFarlane|Jake Goldsbie|Lance Green|Scott Fink|Tim Campbell|Anna Hardwick|Kasia Vassos|Samantha Slan|Joe Cappelletti|Zoe Aggeliki|Riley Raymer|Laura Summer
keywords: mask|witch hat|trick or treating|trick or treaters|nickname as title
title: Las gemelas hechizan dos veces
